verbs.description: [ARG0: irvington neighborhood] [V: pushing] [ARG1: to give popular hot dog vendor his dream] after years serving up hot dogs in the bitter cold a popular east side food cart vendor is pleading for a chance to make his dream come true the owner of garcia hot dogs has spent seven winters in indy and more than three decades behind his cart
